descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Jump into the wild — you’re a gorilla, and your hands are everything. Swing, grab, climb. with friend, across a swaying rope bridge, fling yourselves down a slide, scramble up sheer trunks. 🦍✨

This is a cooperative VR adventure about movement and momentum. Start when your troop unearths a glowing Magic Array and remembers a distant, frozen egg on a cliff. Together you’ll trek across frozen valleys, fighting off beasts that try to stop you. Each successful clash makes your weapon feel heavier and meaner — your swings grow stronger as you do. No puzzles — just pure, physical play: push, pull.😄

When you place the dragon egg on the altar, something ancient stirs. An ally will awakens to help you march toward the source of the freezing curse. 
Pick up your friends, grab the egg, and swing for the summit — go make a story worth yelling about! 😄🏔️
